alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, south central Craven, east central Onslow and southwestern Carteret Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Swansboro, or 7 miles east of Piney Green, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, Cape Carteret, Silverdale, Kuhns, Peletier, Broad Creek, Bogue, Bogue Inlet Pier and Cedar Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
